rakiya karannangen athi bahutharaya paudgalika anshaye rakiya karana ayayi.owunta deshapalakayan awashya nathayi sithamu.rajayeda siyaluma pathkiri bandawaganim patipati mangin winiwida yana aakarayata kirimen deshapalakaya paththakata kara thabiya haka.deshapalakaya iwath kala sanin dushanaya nawathinne natha.niladharin athamwita deshapalakayanta idiriyeni.mehidi apa katha karanne janathawa deshapalanikawa balaganwimata wadawasam purudu balapana nisa eyata wisaduma kumakda kiyayi.dushanaya wani de wenamama katha kala yuthuya.rajya samanga purawasiya dadi lesa bandi sitina kiyubawa wani rataka siyalla rajya anugrahayen siduwana wita nidahasa pilibada gatalu athiwe.rajaya kudu mahath siyalledima mangapenwanna lesa sitiya yuthu natha.jawipe ,hela urumaya, peratugami wani mathawadi paksha bihiwima mema kramayata abhiyogayak wuwath eya kisisethma pramanawath natha.
